Lee, on his first duck hunt, is hoping to learn quickly and become the official goose guy of the outdoors while Uncle Si tries not to shoot the decoys!?!

programme.title: Realtree Roadtrips
programme.desc: It's day No. 3 of the opening-week deer hunt in Nebraska, and the Road Trips Crew is on a roll. Chipper Jones continues his hunt for Mr. Perfect, Michael Pitts spots a shooter, and Bryan Brown moves stands in hopes the move will pay off.

programme.title: Realtree Roadtrips
programme.desc: Tyler Jordan takes his sister Graycen hunting the day after Christmas on Realtree Farms in Georgia. Graycen is going after a big 8-pointer that showed up in the last few days on trail cameras.

programme.title: Black Cloud
programme.desc: Dr. Duck and Billy Campbell head north to the Dakotas to get a jump on the 2019 duck season with Ed McDonough and friends. Stale weather and too much water make field hunting a bust, but a cold front and a pothole covered in birds quickly changes the tempo and helps the crew ring in the new season in style.

programme.title: Realtree Roadtrips
programme.desc: This week's episode takes place at the famed Honey Brake in Louisiana. Drake White kicks things off with a big 8-pointer, capping off an amazing comeback story for him. Riley Green continues his hot streak and takes a target buck. Finally, Tyler Jordan rounds out the incredible trip with his best buck ever. It's a giant typical.

programme.title: Black Cloud
programme.desc: Dr. Duck and Billy Campbell meet a new friend at the boat ramp. The group teams up in the timber. Then, an afternoon scouting trip pays off as the pair finds new water and new ducks.

programme.title: Goin' Coastal
programme.desc: In the Pilot episode of Goin Coastal High School sweethearts Josh and Anna Calhoon hit their local waters of Ft. Walton Beach, FL and show off the diversity of the Estuary.

programme.title: Goin' Coastal
programme.desc: Josh and good friend as well as fellow guide, Josh Nelson hit the beach for some stud Redfish. They also met with Alex Fogg (Coastal resource manager) for a redfish release with the CCA.

programme.title: Goin' Coastal
programme.desc: Josh and Alex Fogg The Coastal Resource Manager of Destin / Ft. Walton beach fish some of the artificial reefs that have been deployed over the past 20 years.

programme.title: Goin' Coastal
programme.desc: Josh and Anna set out for a last minute fishing trip that runs a little late. They take a quick detour to the parent pick up line to get the kids from school, and head back out on the water to see whats biting!

programme.title: Goin' Coastal
programme.desc: Josh takes his friend Isaiah to the blue water as they look for destin's latest hot bite, the blackfin tuna.

programme.title: Goin' Coastal
programme.desc: Josh and George from Two Georges Marina battle the wind and tide on a tough day of fishing which leads Josh to fish another day, solely for revenge on the Sheepshead!

programme.title: Wentz Brother's Outdoors
programme.desc: Cameraman, Kyle gets behind the bow for a couple hunts in Kentucky and connects with his first buck in over 5 years.

programme.title: Wentz Brother's Outdoors

programme.desc: Rush and Ali head to La Paz Mexico to fish with longtime friends and soak up some Baja living in the City of Peace. In part one of this two part series, the guys fish offshore targeting striped marlin and dorado with a few surprises.

programme.title: Local Knowledge
programme.desc: Ali & Rush look back on the adventures of the year and revisit the concept behind Local Knowledge.

programme.title: Local Knowledge
programme.desc: The word is out! The Southern California Bluefin Tuna fishing is on fire and the waters of San Diego are literally Foaming with Life. Ali and Rush switch their targets from the jumbo size Bluefin Tuna to a smaller, medium grade fish for non-stop run and gun action. But, with so many fish fixated on the masses of bait in the area, it may take a million casts to pull one out of the froth.

programme.title: Life On The Water
programme.desc: Brandon gets back to his roots and explores the waterways around Cape Canaveral in his Pelican Kayak with his old Fishing buddy, Tyler Hendrix

programme.title: Life On The Water
programme.desc: It's a trip back to Southwest Florida to chase after Redfish and Snook. Plus, a special tour of the Costa Custom Boat Factory

programme.title: Life On The Water
programme.desc: Snapper and Grouper out in the Gulf of Mexico are waiting for Brandon Simmons and Eric Davis. They just have to ride the sporty chop to get to them.

programme.title: Life On The Water

programme.title: Blair Wiggins Outdoors
programme.desc: Capt. Blair goes back to Marco Island with Capt. Chris Broome to tackle the beautiful inshore spots before heading offshore the next day.

programme.title: The Cast
programme.desc: The Crew heads to Rivers Lodge and Hunt Club in Kansas to fish strip pits. Trenton and Rex take on Mike and Nate in a 3 period mini tournament. With multiple species allowed including northern pike, the two teams are neck and neck after the first two periods. Due to bad weather on day 2, period 3 turned into a hour speed round where only keeper largemouth count.

programme.title: Stomping Grounds
programme.desc: From country music star Brian Kelleys big 56 Sunny Briggs Sportfishing Yacht, to getting caught in a storm aboard a small Hurricane deck boat in the Gulf of Mexico, this episode of Stomping Grounds has host Ryan McVinney exploring boat culture in Floridas Panhandle region, from the Emerald Coast to The Big Bend and the Forgotten Coast. Brian Kelley, aka Beach Cowboy, or BK for short, makes up one half of the country music group Florida Georgia Line (FGL) and has just released his own solo album Sunshine State of Mind. Kelley invites viewers aboard his vessel the Brittney Marie which was named after his wife, for a look at the couples Stomping Grounds. Songs from his album play on the boats sound system - including a tune about shopping for a boat on Boat Trader

programme.title: Into The Blue
programme.desc: Deep dropping for Queen Snapper is as technical as it gets, Captains Scott Walker and Steve Rodger show how they manage to bring home dinner.

programme.title: Into The Blue
programme.desc: Guest MLB player, Myles Straw, gets his first taste fishing the Florida Keys.

programme.title: Into The Blue
programme.desc: Fall in the Florida Keys can be a very productive time of year, specially for those who love to chase down sailfish in the shallow waters.

programme.title: Baitfuel Fishing Tournament
programme.desc: The final qualifier takes place out of Cardinal, Ontario on the mighty St. Lawrence River.

programme.title: Baitfuel Fishing Tournament

programme.title: Beyond The Surface
programme.desc: Experience the thrill of fishing in the enchanting waters of the Everglades alongside the renowned Captain Danny Allen and Captain Leiza Fitzgerald. Embark on an unforgettable journey through the intricate maze of mangroves, expansive marshes, and shimmering backwaters, as these expert guides lead you to some of the most coveted fishing spots in the region.

programme.title: Beyond The Surface
programme.desc: Join Captain Danny Allen and Dan Benson from Power-Pole as they embark on an exciting fishing expedition in Cortez, Florida, in the latest installment of Beyond The Surface TV. Witness their relentless pursuit of fish as they adapt to the ever-changing conditions. Don't make the mistake of skipping this captivating episode it's bound to leave you hooked!

programme.title: Beyond The Surface
programme.desc: Captain Danny Allen and Captain Bill Pitman are two seasoned fishermen who share an unyielding passion for the art of angling. Their extraordinary skills and deep love for the sea have led them to the breathtaking waters of Fernandina Beach , a hidden gem known for its abundant marine life and picturesque surroundings.

programme.title: Beyond The Surface
programme.desc: Prepare to embark on an awe-inspiring aquatic journey as "Legendary Pursuits: Conquering the Depths of Port Saint Joe" takes you on an epic fishing adventure like no other. Join us as we cast off into the pristine waters of Port Saint Joe, a coastal paradise brimming with marine treasures waiting to be discovered.

programme.title: Beyond The Surface
programme.desc: Dive into the exhilarating world of tarpon fishing in the historic city of St. Augustine, Florida. Join Capt. Danny as henavigates the timeless waters of the oldest city in Florida, seeking the mighty tarpon. These fish will test your angling skills and endurance.

programme.title: Their Life My Lens
programme.desc: On this installment, Chasten is joined by her friend Ian! The two of them embark on a smile filled adventure, seeking the elusive inshore slam!

programme.title: Their Life My Lens
programme.desc: Come with us on a cold winter day, as we put Carter on his first Sheepshead.

programme.title: Their Life My Lens
programme.desc: Emily and Chasten catch a pretty big inshore slam

programme.title: Their Life My Lens
programme.desc: Jared and Chasten head off the beach to catch a variety of offshore fish.

programme.title: Their Life My Lens
programme.desc: Karsyn and Chasten head out on an adventure in Ozello, Fl.

programme.title: Their Life My Lens
programme.desc: Chasten and old friend Dylan take to the waters of Sarasota chasing Snook, Trout and Snapper! The duo make the best of the day before afternoon rainstorms chase them back to the dock.

programme.title: Duck Camp Dinners
programme.desc: The Duck Camp Dinners crew catches catfish and fries up seafood while they visit neighbors in the swamps before the cook up an iconic Cajun dish.

programme.title: Duck Camp Dinners
programme.desc: The Duck Camp Dinners crew leaves the bayous and heads down river to Venice, Louisiana where they prepare for their first duck hunt in the delta.

programme.title: Duck Camp Dinners
programme.desc: The DCD crew spends a day on the water fishing in an effort to complete the trifecta of a meat haul. Blake shows us where he spent much of his childhood and we get a glimpse of mother natures impact on community.

programme.title: Duck Camp Dinners
programme.desc: Similar to any good Cajun dish, a successful duck camp requires preparation. The last day on dry land is filled with essential stops to get ready for 5 days on the Bayou. Whether making sure we have the right ingredients for our favorite meals, or getting the boats brushed up and ready for action, the day before can be just as important as the day of.

programme.title: Duck Camp Dinners
programme.desc: Tune in as Jean-Paul and the crew share their first day full day at duck camp with a morning in the duck blind and catfish on the jug line. At the end of the day they put their Cajun grocery goods together for an epic duck camp meal.

programme.title: Duck Camp Dinners
programme.desc: It's the final day at Duck Camp for Jean-Paul and the guys. They finish up their trip with a morning of hunting followed by an afternoon filled with crawfish and catfish. The trip ends on dry land and the crew reflects on what makes the duck camp so special.

programme.title: The Cast
programme.desc: Mike heads to Table Rock Lake to meet up with Trenton and his family. Even battling the tough fishing conditions following a heavy front, theres never a lack of family time, laughs or friendly competitions with the Southards.

programme.title: The Cast
programme.desc: Trenton is headed to meet up with Andrew Norbye on Lake Guntersville in Alabama. With not a lot of current being pulled, the deep schools werent set up to feed. So they went up shallow to fish grass until evening time when the ledge fish really started biting.

programme.title: The Cast
programme.desc: Rex meets up with Mr Crappie Wally Marshall in Texas. Wally takes Rex to one of his secret spots to put the hammer on the crappie. Not only did they catch crappie, but nice largemouth and some top tier coppernose bluegill.

programme.title: The Cast
programme.desc: The Crew heads to Rivers Lodge and Hunt Club in Kansas to fish strip pits. Trenton and Rex take on Mike and Nate in a 3 period mini tournament. With multiple species allowed including northern pike, the two teams are neck and neck after the first two periods. Due to bad weather on day 2, period 3 turned into a hour speed round where only keeper largemouth count.

programme.title: The Cast
programme.desc: Trenton meets up with Tom Brewbaker as they fly down to Venice Louisiana to fish with Mike Frenette. Mike runs the Redfish Lodge of Louisiana and has over forty years of angling experience. Mike teaches the guys about the local waters including pogey boats and most importantly, world class red fish.

programme.title: The Cast
programme.desc: Trenton goes down North Carolina to learn the family secrets of the Forehand family. Ben Forehand is a guitarist for Christian Contemporary artist Pat Barret. When Ben isnt playing guitar, he runs Wild and Free Outfitters getting people into the outdoors hunting and fishing, getting their minds off of the everyday grind. . Even though fishing is tough the guys build strong friendships and lasting memories.

programme.title: The Cast
programme.desc: Trenton stays close to home and heads to the Lake of The Ozarks joining Austin Culbertson for a frigid couple days of fishing. The cold weather doesnt hold back the fish, though, as they target brush piles with jerk baits and umbrella rigs.

programme.title: The Cast
programme.desc: Trenton and Trevor pack up and drive down to Arkansas for their first experience on the White River. The brothers spend a day in the boat with Bryant Stark of Rising Rivers, fishing the White and the Norfork. Though the White is much larger waters than back home, Trevor utilizes his experience to catch them even while wading.

programme.title: The Cast
programme.desc: Trenton makes a trip to South Carolina to fish Lake Murray. He meets up with the Rather Outdoors crew to spend time on the water and at the Rather HQ checking out all the gear from Lews and Strike King.

programme.title: The Cast
programme.desc: The Crew is chasing Tarpon in Tampa Florida with Ryan Harrington. After a few close calls and grinding out the long days, they finally catch up to the Silver King.

programme.title: The Cast
programme.desc: The Southards continue their family tradition on Table Rock Lake. While theyre there, Trenton spends a day with Mr. Worldwide James Watson and learns some things from one of the best anglers on the lake.

programme.title: The Cast
programme.desc: With a free day before Icast. Trenton and Ryan go offshore to try and fill the cooler. Catching a variety of species and hoping to get their hands on a hogfish.

programme.title: Straight Up Fishing
programme.desc: Brian is Joined by Ryan Harder from Zman on an epic 70-mile inshore fishing journey in the Lowcountry, aiming for the coveted inshore slam.

programme.title: Straight Up Fishing
programme.desc: Brian heads to Tuskegee, Alabama to night-fish the home waters of the one and only Mark Daniels Junior.

programme.title: Straight Up Fishing
programme.desc: Brian hosts a championship for his SUF tournament series. Anglers from all over the country will travel to lake Sinclair to compete for the grand prize.

programme.title: Hunting Land Man
programme.desc: A Southwest Mississippi GIANT Barry has made more daylight appearances than possibly any mature bucks in existence. Now that Slade is back from the midwest The chase is on.

programme.title: Hunting Land Man
programme.desc: In this episode, hunting season swiftly coming to an end. Withthe real estate world getting busier, Slade and his family set outto fill some tags, and fill up the freezer. Its time to go on a DoePatrol!

programme.title: Hunting Land Man
programme.desc: The 2024 turkey season has arrived. Slade and Bentley are already off to a great start. Bentley managed to take one down opening weekend for youth hunt. And Slade took one down opening day. This episode features an inside look into Slades life filled with real eastate and the great outdoors.

programme.title: Beyond The Surface
programme.desc: Join seasoned anglers Danny Allen and Greg Devault as they embark on an exhilarating fishing expedition along the serene waters of the Econfina River and the breathtaking Gulf Coast. In this thrilling TV show, watch as Danny and Greg tackle the challenges of reeling in trophy fish while exploring the diverse ecosystems and hidden gems of these picturesque locales. With expert tips, breathtaking scenery, and unforgettable moments, this fishing adventure promises excitement and inspiration for anglers of all levels. Tune in to witness the excitement unfold on the waters of the Econfina River and the Gulf Coast with Danny Allen and Greg Devault!

programme.title: Chasin' The Sun
programme.desc: While releasing a defeated tarpon healthy after an epic battle is the ultimate victory, everything else is measured in heartbreak and degrees of failure. For Justin, putting Ethan on his first silver king requires patience and a tasty diversion by a local chef.

programme.title: Winchester Life
programme.desc: Overview: East Alton, Illinois is the home of Winchester Ammunition and the manufacturing home of the shotshell plants that build and produce millions of rounds of ammo for hunters, sport shooters, military and law enforcement. Get an unprecedented inside look at the birth cycle of a shotshell inside the walls of Winchester. From hull to primer, shot to wad and packaging to shipping, watch how the most legendary and successful ammunition brand in the world comes to is born and built.

programme.title: Hunting Land Man
programme.desc: In this episode, Slade takes us through his new investment property, and breaks downwhats involved in taking a raw land tract and creating extremely desirable turn-keyhunting properties.Caleb and Slade double up on some Wilkinson County gobblers for Calebs first turkeykill ever.

programme.title: HUnting Land Man
programme.desc: In this episode, Slade and his brother Tai take us around a new investment property - a 55 acre tract in Wilkinson County, MS and go over what it took to take an undesirable raw tract, to a place with multiple offers on the first day it was put on the market.
Chris Schmidt and his son Hunter go after some big east coast bucks and a whopper of a bruin before closing out the season in Kansas.

programme.title: The Raven Project
programme.desc: Its the best week of the year and the Raven crew is getting together for a fun filled week at Rifle Camp.

programme.title: The Raven Project
programme.desc: The boys are still at the Dirty bird in Oklahoma, trying to get a few more tasks done before heading back to the Raven in Missouri. They also manage to get out and do a little velvet scouting with the Hawk spotting scope.

programme.title: Black Cloud
programme.desc: Dr. Duck and Billy Campbell are back on public land duck hunting with family and friends. After a tough scouting mission only finding a few birds the group goes for broke on new water and the Mallards pile in.

programme.title: Rocky Mountain Elk Foundation
programme.desc: Part of our responsibility as citizens in this country is to make sure we not only take care of these resources but we hand it off to the next generation in better condition that we found it. -Bob Ziehmer, Senior Director of Conservation for Bass Pro Shops & Cabela's Join Bob in New Mexico as he talks about taking care of our natural resources for future generations. Special thanks to Express UU Bar Ranch

programme.title: Wentz Brother's Outdoors
programme.desc: Zach and Carson Wentz chase long beards throughout the Midwest.

programme.title: HuntStand Presents
programme.desc: Hunter Nelson has been dreaming of the day hed get to tag his first buck. So, his father sets the stage by reconnecting with a long-time friend and ranch owner in Texas.

programme.title: HuntStand TIps and Gear
programme.desc: Custom building arrows is a great way to get the most from your overall bowhunting setup.

programme.title: Browning Films
programme.desc: Aoudad Country Part 2- Kyle Barefield and Cole Barthel from All Things hunting head to the Texas and Mexico border on a DIY Aoudad hunt where Cole is after his first Aoudad. After that Kyle teams up with good friend Chris Griffin where they head to another Ranch on the border and hunt two giant Aoudad rams with a rifles.

programme.title: Working Class Hunter
programme.desc: Stephen has a score to settle with a Missouri buck he missed two years ago. Now, during the rut and with snow on the ground, the chase is on. The woods come alive as Stephen hones in on his target. This is the hunt hes been waiting fordont miss the moment when it all comes together.

programme.title: Modern Hunter
programme.desc: A different perspective is taken as we follow along with two modern day hunting guides and find out why they do what they do.

programme.title: Deer and Deer Hunting
programme.desc: We explore the sophisticated world of the whitetail deer's senses, exploring how these remarkable creatures have evolved to pattern hunters through their keen sense of smell and heightened sensory awareness.

programme.title: Deer and Deer Hunting
programme.desc: Dan Schmidt and Mark Kayser share insights into the natural behavior of whitetail bucks, particularly during the rutting season, and how scrapes play into their territorial and mating behaviors.

programme.title: Deer and Deer Hunting
programme.desc: Renowned hunter Mark Kayser faces one of his most challenging hunts yet in the sparse woodlands of Nebraska.

programme.title: Deer and Deer Hunting
programme.desc: Famed Social Media Influencer Leigh McClendon refuses to cave into the pressure of some of his followers who don't support his love of hunting big Whitetail Bucks.

programme.title: Deer and Deer Hunting
programme.desc: In this eye-opening episode, Dan Schmidt explores the fascinating science behind a whitetail deer's vision.

programme.title: Deer and Deer Hunting
programme.desc: Anatomy Hunter Brian Johnson shares his meticulous research on deer anatomy and behavior, guiding Dan through the critical factors that determine the perfect shot placement.

programme.title: Primal Divide
programme.desc: In most cases, the cameraman or woman hunts as well Often their play time happens between scheduled season hunts for the show. But why dont we see those? This year, I made it a point to film all of my camera girls hunts and decided to make an episode out of it. Without help, none of this possible! So to all the camera operators, behind the scenes industry folks Thank you and this is for you!!!

programme.title: Primal Divide
programme.desc: In this episode we kick off with calling in a bird for the Bellator Light Heavyweight Champ, Corey Anderson on a farm in Kentucky. We roll up to Ohio and double up on a foggy morning, then it was back to Iowa where John linked up with Skyline Motorsports Crew Chief of the #16 Longhorn, Zeb to chase birds in NE Iowa. Another double to close out the season! 5 turkeys in the episode, Enjoy!!

programme.title: Primal Divide
programme.desc: In this episode, John competes in another Tactical Games event in Pennsylvania and a Total Archery Challenge. If youre not familiar with these. The Tactical Games is a cross fit meets 2 Gun style competition. The TAC events are a big Archery 3D fun shoot with targets ranging from 15 to 120 yds! If youve never done one of these, DO IT!!!

programme.title: Primal Divide
programme.desc: In this episode, John travels to Arizona at the end of June for an OTC Rifle Elk hunt! This rare opportunity due to Arizona opening a summer tag on private and state land allows non residents to obtain a chance at a velvet bull! High temps and high anticipation are filled with this hunt!

programme.title: Primal Divide
programme.desc: John heads back to Kentucky once again!! After moving away in 2016, John hasnt connected on a KY buck since! If it could go wrong, it went wrong! But, optimism is high this year on a new piece of property his buddy from high school just bought! Short window to get this hunt in before the western swing kicks in too! Can he get it done and break the bad luck?

programme.title: Primal Divide
programme.desc: In this episode, we travel with John back to Colorado. A familiar spot where he has tagged out before on Mule Deer with a bow. Back for the third year as he tries to keep the streak going! Several stalks go out the window before he closes in on a target buck at 44 yds! Will he keep the luck on his side?

programme.title: Stomping Grounds
programme.desc: From country music star Brian Kelleys big 56 Sunny Briggs Sportfishing Yacht, to getting caught in a storm aboard a small Hurricane deck boat in the Gulf of Mexico, this episode of Stomping Grounds has host Ryan McVinney exploring boat culture in Floridas Panhandle region, from the Emerald Coast to The Big Bend and the Forgotten Coast. Brian Kelley, aka Beach Cowboy, or BK for short, makes up one half of the country music group Florida Georgia Line (FGL) and has just released his own solo album Sunshine State of Mind. Kelley invites viewers aboard his vessel the Brittney Marie which was named after his wife, for a look at the couples Stomping Grounds. Songs from his album play on the boats sound system - including a tune about shopping for a boat on Boat Trader

But when she invites her snooty prospective in-laws to dinner to give their blessing to the marriage, Alice's peculiar extended family -- including philosophical grandfather Martin Vanderhof (Lionel Barrymore), hapless fledgling ballerina sister Essie (Ann Miller) and fireworks enthusiast father, Paul (Samuel S. Hinds) -- might be too eccentric for the staid Kirbys.

programme.title: A Man's Castle
programme.desc: In this Depression-era drama, the gruff and homeless Bill (Spencer Tracy) decides to help out the beautiful, destitute Trina (Loretta Young). Trina falls for Bill, and they set up house together in a shantytown, but he longs to get out of New York City and hit the open road. When Trina discovers she's pregnant, Bill plans to rob a toy store with a shifty drifter named Bragg (Arthur Hohl) in order to leave her with money. But will the scheme pan out?

programme.title: Beyond Mombasa
programme.desc: A hard-drinking American travels to East Africa to find out what happened to his uranium-miner brother and find the parties responsible for his murder.

programme.title: Drive a Crooked Road
programme.desc: Auto mechanic Mickey must give up his dream of becoming a professional race car driver after he is fooled into being a chump for some gangsters.

programme.title: Doctor Faustus
programme.desc: Frustrated with the limits of his knowledge, Dr. Faustus calls upon Lucifer and offers his soul in return for 24 years of hedonism and invincibility.

programme.title: The Solid Gold Cadillac
programme.desc: A small stockholder-turned-corporate heroine ousts a crooked Board of Trustees and reinstates an honest director, falling in love along the way.

programme.title: Run Wild, Run Free
programme.desc: A mute boy who spends his days roaming the English countryside starts coming out of his shell when he befriends a wild pony and a retired colonel.

programme.title: Girls Can Play
programme.desc: A detective investigates the murder of a player on a professional girl's softball team.

programme.title: Duffy
programme.desc: A professional smuggler gets involved in a scheme by two half-brothers to steal a fortune from their wealthy fathers yacht in the Mediterranean.

programme.title: Tell It to the Judge
programme.desc: Marsha Meredith (Rosalind Russell) has just been offered a position as a federal judge. Much to her dismay, her nomination is challenged on the grounds that her divorce renders her unsuitable for the courtroom. Desperate to win the position, Marsha arranges a fake marriage to Alexander (Gig Young), even though she still has feelings for Peter (Robert Cummings), her ex-husband. Marsha and Alexander -- and Marsha and Peter -- soon find themselves in a series of compromising situations.

programme.title: Loss of Innocence
programme.desc: Left alone because of their mother's sudden hospitalization during a vacation in France, four British children have to fend for themselves. They stay at a hotel, where, despite the reticence of owner Madame Zisi (Danielle Darrieux), they are befriended by her lover, Eliot (Kenneth More). Joss (Susannah York), the eldest of the children, runs afoul of Madame Zisi, who thinks Eliot is spending too much time with her and causes a scene. Robbed of Eliot's attention, Joss denounces him to the police.

programme.title: Divorce American Style
programme.desc: A nouveau-riche L.A. couple decide to call it quits after 17 years of marriage, but alimony woes send the bachelor in search of a husband for his ex.

programme.title: There's Always a Woman
programme.desc: An investigator for the district attorney and his amateur sleuth wife compete to solve a murder mystery behind the death of a woman's husband.

programme.title: The Chase
programme.desc: This steamy pot-boiler follows the intrigues surrounding an escaped convict who attempts to return to the small southern town where he grew up.

programme.title: Where Angels Go...Trouble Follows
programme.desc: A bus trip for the girls of St. Francis Academy in Pennsylvania takes a radical detour on its way to an interfaith youth rally in California.

programme.title: In the French Style
programme.desc: A young American travels to Paris to become an artist. Swept up in a series of affairs, she must decide whether to stay or return home to get married.

programme.title: A Dandy in Aspic
programme.desc: In this stylish spy thriller, a Londoner working in British Intelligence, Alexander Eberlin, turns out to be a Russian counter-espionage agent.

programme.title: Harriet Craig
programme.desc: A cold, perfectionist wife will stop at nothing to have her house and life run as she wishes, even if it means controlling her husband's every move.

programme.title: Picnic
programme.desc: Based on the play by William Inge.

programme.title: American Madness
programme.desc: During the Depression, the bank owned by generous Dickson (Walter Huston) is barely staying afloat, and things get worse when $100,000 is lifted from the vault. Fingers are pointed at reformed crook Matt (Pat O'Brien), who got a job and a fresh start from Dickson. The innocent Matt can clear his name by admitting that on the night of the robbery he was breaking up a tryst between Dickson's wife and another teller. But this revelation may crush Dickson, and Matt's conscience plays tug-of-war.

programme.title: It Happened to Jane
programme.desc: When a shipment of expired shellfish arrives to her New England lobstery, Jane Osgood decides to take a capitalist railroad tycoon to court.

programme.title: The Fuller Brush Man
programme.desc: Clumsy sanitation worker Red Jones (Red Skelton) is fired from his street-cleaning job shortly after his girlfriend, Ann Elliot (Janet Blair), refuses his marriage proposal until he betters himself. While training to become a door-to-door salesman, he accidentally stumbles into a murder investigation when the corrupt sanitation commissioner (Nicholas Joy) who had fired him is killed. When the murder weapon is found to be one of the brushes Red sells, he must fight to prove his innocence.

programme.title: Three on a Couch
programme.desc: An artist hopes to move to Paris, but his psychiatrist fiance fears abandoning her patients, so he dons various disguises to cure the lonesome women.

programme.title: The Three Stooges in Orbit
programme.desc: When a pair of Martians steal a powerful submarine-tank-rocket military weapon from an inventor, the Three Stooges step in to try to save the day.

programme.title: Ten Wanted Men
programme.desc: Rancher John Stewart (Randolph Scott) prefers to to resolve problems without falling back on violent solutions. However, fellow cattleman Wick Campbell (Richard Boone) isn't so peaceful, and he hires a team of armed mercenaries, led by ruthless Frank Scavo (Leo Gordon), to rid him of any possible competition. After narrowly surviving an attack from Scavo and his men, Stewart has little choice but to fight back in order to save both his ranch and his family, including nephew Howie (Skip Homeier).

programme.title: The Tall T
programme.desc: The victims must outsmart their cruel captors after an outlaw, and his gang kidnap an heiress, her nervous husband, and a rancher.

programme.title: Massacre Canyon
programme.desc: A cavalry officer and two of his men set out to make sure that a shipment of guns safely reaches its destination.

programme.title: The Man From Colorado
programme.desc: In Colorado at the end of the Civil War, Col. Owen Devereaux (Glenn Ford), affected by four years of brutal bloodshed, orders the massacre of a Confederate unit, even as they try to surrender. Devereaux's friend and second in command, Capt. Del Stewart (William Holden), is the only one aware of the surrender attempt. Devereaux returns home to a hero's welcome and is appointed a judge, yet his irrational and angry behavior continues, affecting his fiance, Caroline (Ellen Drew), as well as Del.

programme.title: The Hellions
programme.desc: A small-town policeman (Richard Todd) stands alone against a family of outlaws in 19th-century South Africa.

programme.title: Mackenna's Gold
programme.desc: Apaches, townsfolk, a Mexican bandit (Omar Sharif) and the cavalry follow a sheriff (Gregory Peck) to a mythical canyon of gold.

programme.title: Wyoming Renegades
programme.desc: An ex-convict (Phil Carey) and his girlfriend (Martha Hyer) cannot start over until they stop Butch Cassidy's (Gene Evans) gang.

programme.title: Ambush at Tomahawk Gap
programme.desc: Flaming arrows stop four ex-convicts searching a ghost town for their buried loot.

programme.title: That Texas Jamboree
programme.desc: In 1890, Curt Chambers, the new sheriff of Crescent City, is disgraced when the crooked mayor forces him to shut down a popular medicine show. To save his reputation and a romance, Curt has the medicine tested to prove its value.

programme.title: Secret of Treasure Mountain
programme.desc: An Apache curse hangs over good guys (Valerie French, William Prince) and a villain (Raymond Burr) seeking Spanish gold.

programme.title: The Great Sioux Massacre
programme.desc: The story of Gen. Custer (Philip Carey) and the Little Bighorn is seen through the eyes of two of his subordinates (Joseph Cotten, Darren McGavin).

programme.title: The Texan Meets Calamity Jane
programme.desc: Calamity Jane's rightful ownership of a gambling hall is challenged but a Texas lawyer puts up a sensational legal battle to help her stay in charge.

programme.title: Fort Ti
programme.desc: Capt. Horn (George Montgomery) and Rogers' Rangers raid Fort Ticonderoga during the French and Indian War.

programme.title: The Texican
programme.desc: Deputy Jess Carlin (Audie Murphy) leaves his Texas hometown in disgrace, framed by corrupt saloon owner Luke Starr (Broderick Crawford) for a crime he didn't commit. When his brother, muckraking newspaper editor Roy Carlin (Vctor Vilanova), is murdered after printing an expos of Starr's crooked deals, Carlin returns home from the Mexican border town where he's been holed up and enlists his brother's fiance (Luz Mrquez) and saloon dancer Kit O'Neal (Diana Lorys) to bring Starr down.

programme.title: The Son of Davy Crockett
programme.desc: President Ulysses S. Grant enlists a frontiersman's son to help insure the inclusion of Texas into the Union.

programme.title: Thomasine & Bushrod
programme.desc: In this beloved Blaxploitation flick set in 1911, a team of thieves steal from wealthy capitalists, to return their riches to deserving families.

programme.title: Ride Beyond Vengeance
programme.desc: Based on the novel by Al Dewlen.

programme.title: Texas Cyclone
programme.desc: A traveling cowboy visits an unusual town where everyone assumes he is a man who was once presumed to be dead, including the mans wife.

programme.title: Ride Lonesome
programme.desc: A bounty hunter escorts a killer to prison but allows his outlaw brother to catch up with them to have a showdown over a previous shocking murder.

programme.title: Ten Wanted Men
programme.desc: Rancher John Stewart (Randolph Scott) prefers to to resolve problems without falling back on violent solutions. However, fellow cattleman Wick Campbell (Richard Boone) isn't so peaceful, and he hires a team of armed mercenaries, led by ruthless Frank Scavo (Leo Gordon), to rid him of any possible competition. programme.title: The Return of Wild Bill
programme.desc: Wild Bill Saunders comes home to help his father deal with troublesome ranchers.

programme.title: The Parson and the Outlaw
programme.desc: Billy the Kid (Anthony Dexter) retires from the outlaw life, fakes his own death and adopts the name William Bonney. Soon, William runs into Jack Slade (Sonny Tufts), a gun-toting stranger who is itching for a gunfight. Jack falls in with a group of thugs terrorizing William's town. The Rev. Jericho Jones (Buddy Rogers) exhorts William to defend the townspeople, and, when William's maid, Tonya (Marie Windsor), is beaten by the thugs, he grabs his pistol.

programme.title: The Palomino
programme.desc: Steve Norris (Jerome Courtland), the heir to a meat-packing fortune, has a yearning to set out and forge a path of his own. His rebellious streak leads him to the broken down horse-breeding farm of the bewitching beauty Maria Guevara (Beverly Tyler). Enchanted by this determined young woman, Norris decides to assist her in saving her business. But this enrages duplicitous rival breeder Ben Lane (Roy Roberts), who steals away Guevara's prize palomino in an attempt to cripple her operation.

programme.title: Major Dundee
programme.desc: During the end of the Civil War, Major Dundee guards Confederate prisoners, Union deserters and ordinary hard-bitten criminals in a remote fort. When Apaches attack the fort and make off with three children, Dundee must set up a posse including Confederates, who face a choice between joining up or being shot. The feud between Dundee and Tyreen is also heated up by a sultry Mexican widow.

programme.title: The Man From Tumbleweeds
programme.desc: Ex-convict gunfighters join a state ranger (Bill Elliott) on patrol for outlaws.

programme.desc: The year is 1935, and James Stewart has been released from prison after serving a 40-year sentence. He wants nothing more than to claim the $25,000 waiting for him in a local bank, but the president of the bank doesn't want him to have it.

programme.title: The Shadow Riders
programme.desc: Two brothers return home after the Civil War to find that their family has been kidnapped by a marauding band of rebel Confederate guerrillas.

programme.title: Midsomer Murders
programme.desc: The music lovers of Midsomer County are delighted when a host of bands arrives for the Midsomer Rocks festival. Barnaby himself is particularly looking forward to seeing recently re-formed rock band, Hired Gun, perform on stage, but he soon gets close to the band for rather unfortunate reasons. During their opening performance, the band's singer, Mimi (Suzi Quatro), falls to the ground dead - electrocuted by a wire that had been run through the microphone stand. Barnaby and Jones soon find the rest of the band could be targets, and when another is killed, questions are raised as to whether former band member, Ginger Foxton, who went missing for 30 years and is presumed dead, is still at large. The detectives soon have to delve into a world of rock music, drug use and greed, to find the truth.

programme.title: Midsomer Murders
programme.desc: The suspicious death of popular young GP Dr Alan Delaney brings Barnaby and Jones to Midsomer Market to investigate. The detectives are baffled as to a motive for murder - until they consider that the newly engaged Dr James Kirkwood may have been the intended victim. Before long, Barnaby and Jones are heading to Wales - former home to Delyth Mostyn, James's fiancee, to delve deeper into the mystery. There are certainly possible suspects in the murder and attempt on Kirkwood, from Delyth's children, who oppose the engagement, Delyth's husband, and more, as the detectives investigate things, in hopes of uncovering the truth before a major walk is to take place on Mount Snowdon.

programme.title: Midsomer Murders
programme.desc: In the build-up to Luxton Deeping's annual photographic exhibition, a battle rages between the traditional and digital photographers of the pretty village. The dispute seems harmless enough - until Lionel Bell is found murdered in a nearby woodland, strangled with the cord of his light meter. Barnaby soon gets to work tracking down the killer, but it seems someone is trying to implicate the detective in the murder. And once he is replaced on the case, finding the culprit seems less likely than ever, as his replacement is more concerned of an upcoming wedding than the investigation. Barnaby is forced to work off the case to uncover who is framing him, and who wants dead other photographers in the village.

programme.title: Midsomer Murders
programme.desc: The residents of Midsomer Magna are thrilled when a production crew arrives at the local manor house to film a version of The Scarlet Pimpernel. But the crew members aren't the only visitors to the area - Jones has spotted notorious criminal George Ince nearby. But when the director, Nick Cheney, is found dead - his head severed by a prop guillotine - Barnaby must discover who would have wanted the victim dead. It soon becomes clear that things are not so simple, and the detectives soon have to shift through varying motives, layered by lies, hidden truths, and a possible robbery to be committed.

programme.title: CSI: Miami
programme.desc: The CSI team, with the help of local tipsters, fights to save a neighborhood on the brink of being taken over by a violent street gang.

programme.title: CSI: Miami
programme.desc: The CSI team uses radical technology to unlock the secrets of a man's mind when he shows up covered in blood with no memory of where he has been.

programme.title: CSI: Miami
programme.desc: When a murder occurs during a horse race, Horatio discovers that Ryan has a personal connection to the case.

programme.title: CSI: Miami
programme.desc: Alexx Wood comes back when a murderer puts Ryan's and Calleigh's lives at risk.

programme.title: CSI: Miami
programme.desc: The CSI team makes a shocking discovery about its murder victim; Horatio tries to save his son from Julia's erratic behavior.

programme.title: CSI: Miami
programme.desc: Nothing is certain in the case of a flight attendant's brutal murder.

programme.title: CSI: Miami
programme.desc: A home invasion turns into something more when the team discovers that the Russian mob is targeting the group.

programme.title: CSI: Miami
programme.desc: When Ryan is kidnapped, he is forced to betray Horatio and the team.

programme.title: CSI: Miami
programme.desc: A murder case leads Horatio to discover that Ron Saris is alive and seeking revenge on Julia.

programme.title: CSI: Miami
programme.desc: The murder of a reality star throws the CSI team into the scandalous world of a television dating show.

programme.title: CSI: Miami
programme.desc: A seemingly normal family is targeted in a brutal grenade attack, leaving Horatio and the team to figure out why.

programme.title: CSI: Miami
programme.desc: The team investigates when a man is boiled alive; Julia spins out of control; a dark secret is revealed.

programme.title: Crime Stories
programme.desc: Fifteen years after Kathy Odom's murder, new DNA techniques might help detectives to catch her killer.

programme.title: Crime Stories
programme.desc: Investigators find the body of a missing 43-year-old woman who has been gone for 53 days; finding out who murdered her.

programme.title: Crime Stories
programme.desc: Detectives describe catching up to the serial killer of Baton Rouge.

programme.title: Crime Stories
programme.desc: Earl Bramblett's obsession with his friend's 11-year-old daughter spurred him to murder an entire family.

programme.title: MacGyver
programme.desc: While Mac and Jack are tracking a dangerous fugitive, a family of bounty hunters kidnap him; Bozer and Riley try to hack into Jack's CIA file.

programme.title: MacGyver
programme.desc: When Mac and the team are blamed for a terrorist bombing, the Phoenix Foundation is forced to disavow them; the team must clear their names without support from back home.

programme.title: MacGyver
programme.desc: After an earthquake in Hawaii, Mac and the team join Chin and Kono from the Five-0 task force to rescue a group of government scientists trapped in a building; another group tries to steal top-secret weaponry from the scientists.

programme.title: MacGyver
programme.desc: Mac's close friend from M.I.T. fakes her own death to prevent someone from killing her to suppress her scientific research.

programme.title: Criminal Minds
programme.desc: The BAU team investigates an unsub with striking similarities to Rossi's latest obsession, "The Chameleon."

programme.title: Criminal Minds
programme.desc: The team searches for Everett Lynch and his daughter; Spencer has a meaningful visit with his mother.

programme.title: Criminal Minds
programme.desc: The BAU team investigates a series of seemingly random fatal explosions throughout Kentucky and Tennessee.

programme.title: Criminal Minds
programme.desc: The members of the BAU enjoy a Saturday off in vastly different ways; Rossi and Prentiss help Simmons assemble a new crib; Garcia leads a hacking competition; Dr. Reid strikes up a conversation with a woman named Maxine.

programme.title: Criminal Minds
programme.desc: Following a series of fatal shootings, the BAU team travels to Illinois to investigate what appears to be a copycat serial killer.

programme.title: Criminal Minds
programme.desc: After a father and daughter get kidnapped, a former foe of the BAU returns with very specific demands for Dr. Reid.

programme.title: Criminal Minds
programme.desc: When the BAU team travels to Denver to investigate several murders, Prentiss is forced to evaluate her relationship with Special Agent Andrew Mendoza.

programme.title: Criminal Minds
programme.desc: Prentiss and J.J. are faced with important decisions to make about their futures as the BAU travels to Texas to investigate a series of murdered businessmen.

programme.title: Criminal Minds
programme.desc: Rossi develops some new theories about Everett Lynch, aka The Chameleon; the team sets out on an epic hunt to capture Lynch.

programme.title: Midsomer Murders
programme.desc: The ghost village of Little Auburn has been abandoned since the war. When a young man is found murdered during its grand reopening, DCI Barnaby and DS Winter must unravel a sinister web of lies from both past and present in order to catch the killer.

programme.title: Midsomer Murders
programme.desc: The Bleakridge Watch patrols the streets of their remote village, exposing anyone who steps outside the law. When one of their members dies, DCI Barnaby and DS Winter uncover just how far some people will go for power...

programme.title: Midsomer Murders
programme.desc: Tensions run high in Lower Pampling as a new type of cricket threatens a century of tradition. When a star cricketer dies during a tournament, DCI Barnaby and DS Winter's investigation draws them into a dangerous game with a surprise visitor from Barnaby's past...

programme.title: Midsomer Murders
programme.desc: When DCI Barnaby and DS Winter discover a dead body covered in live rabbits it reveals a sinister side to the local pet show. Is this a rivalry taken too far or is the killer driven by something darker?

programme.title: Midsomer Murders
programme.desc: When a young girl slips away from a Jane Austen weekend dressed in period attire, and is found stabbed in the woods, DCI Barnaby and DS Winter need to look back in time to find the killer.

programme.title: Super Sleuths - Midsomer Murders
programme.desc: The Midsomer Murders team opens up about their experience of working on the popular crime drama and provides insight into the overall process of bringing it to the small screen.

programme.title: Midsomer Murders
programme.desc: Carver Valleys comic festival is in full swing when the village is shocked by the murder of a former supermodel. With a scathing comic shaming several villagers as the only lead, Barnaby and Winter are left trying to separate fact from fiction.

programme.title: Midsomer Murders
programme.desc: As the Barnabys prepare for Cully's wedding, Lord Fitzroy and Beth Porteous are married in the pretty village of Bledlow. At the lavish reception at Bledlow Hall that follows, however, tragedy strikes - maid of honour Marina Fellowes is found murdered in one of the rooms by some of the guests. With their honeymoon cancelled, the Fitzroys must contend with a police presence in their home, as Barnaby and Jones try to learn more about the family history. It soon becomes clear there are secrets, deception, and an illegtimate son involved in the mystery, which is further complicated when the estate manager is killed by an arrow.

programme.title: Midsomer Murders
programme.desc: It's a good day for the Hicks family, as the name of Tommy Hicks - who was executed during World War I for "cowardice and desertion" - is added to the list on Midsomer Parva's war memorial. Tommy's son Lionel and grandson Dave, mayor of Causton and whom Barnaby does not like (owing to dodgy building work by the mayor's company), are thrilled, but the snooty Hammonds are decidedly less pleased. Henry, the patriarch of the Hammond family, is particularly riled by his insalubrious neighbours, and has nurtured a long-running feud with the Hickses. But the evening after a battle re-enactment in the village, Henry is murdered - and Barnaby must delve into the history of the two families to find the killer, discovering a web of fraud, lies, and hidden truths.

programme.title: Midsomer Murders
programme.desc: Barnaby and Jones are in Dunstan to investigate the deaths of a reclusive couple. As they try to establish whether Ron and Libby Wilson were murdered or died of natural causes, their attention is drawn to a dispute raging between a local builder and road protesters nearby. When another death occurs, the detectives learn that there are plenty of dark secrets and fierce hostilities in this apparently idyllic village. Will Jack Purdy's quick temper lead to violence? How far would the protesters go to prevent the bypass being built? And do current events somehow relate to the death of Michael Wilson many years earlier?

programme.title: Midsomer Murders
programme.desc: When the body of Londoner Charlie Finleyson is discovered in woodland near Midsomer Sonning, Barnaby and Jones find themselves investigating employees at local Midsomer Life magazine. It turns out the dead man was married to the ex-wife of Guy Sandys, the wealthy owner of the publication. As the detectives become aware of a feud between Guy and the proprietor of the Morecroft Hotel, tensions are also heating up between the locals and visiting Londoners. Soon Barnaby and Jones find themselves to trying to piece together the truth about the murder, and learn that someone might be trying to conceal something in their past.

programme.title: Midsomer Murders
programme.desc: When a pub landlady is crushed to death during a magic show in Midsomer Oaks, Barnaby and Nelson uncover conflict between the village church and ancient pagan traditions. Is famous magician Gideon Latimer to blame or is he the target?

programme.title: Midsomer Murders
programme.desc: Barnaby and Jones are forced to take part in a team building exercise and Tom has plenty of problems dealing with the young, new, acting Chief Superintendent, John Cotton (Nick Fletcher). Following an explosion in a truck that had been stored in a truck depot, a body is soon discovered in a nearby lake, which turns out to be Alec Grainger, who had been seen arguing with James Parkes (Joseph Millson), the son of Colonel Matt Parkes (Tim Pigott-Smith). James appears to be involved in shady business deals and is blamed by his grandmother Caroline Halsey (Judy Parfitt) - and others - for the suicide of a woman he got pregnant two years before. Barnaby and Jones find themselves delving into a mixture of fraud, smuggling, and lies, trying to piece together the truth.

programme.title: Midsomer Murders
programme.desc: In the village of Midsomer Wellow, someone is killing off the bell ringers of the parish church, in the week before a big bell-ringing competition. One young woman on the team is even shot dead in the churchyard on her wedding day.

programme.title: Midsomer Murders
programme.desc: Peter and Caroline Cave are house-hunting in Midsomer Newton. Shortly before leaving their hotel they mention they haven't been able to find what they're looking for; "something old and derelict that they can do up." Anne Merrick tells them about Winyard, a tumbledown cottage in the woods, might be for sale. At the estate agents they are told the house is not yet available for viewing. Later that evening they find the house on their own. However, Caroline has read up on the cottage's haunted reputation and only reluctantly explores it with Peter. The next morning they are found strangled in their own car. DCI Barnaby starts the investigation with the help of PC Ben Jones and they come across the world of estate agents, identical twins, ghosts, piano wire, and more before another body turns up.

programme.title: Midsomer Murders
programme.desc: Villagers of Midsomer Barton are all set to celebrate Oak Apple Week, especially as the carnival queen event is set to return after an eight year absence. Yet the body of the mother of a deceased, one-time carnival queen, found in a stream, looks set to spoil things, as Barnaby and Jones find themselves digging up the past. From familiar faces, to drunken boasts and hidden obessions, it slowly becomes clear that the mother's daughter might be the key to solving the murder, when more deaths follow.

programme.title: Midsomer Murders
programme.desc: Wealthy, eccentric and obese aristocrat Freddy Butler drops dead, shortly after gathering all three of his wives at Haddington Hall to make an announcement. Although George Bullard is adamant his death is from natural causes, the case is far from simple when Freddy's solicitor is deliberately killed in a house fire shortly afterwards and Freddy's will goes missing. Barnaby and Jones find themselves investigating the extended Butler family, uncovering hidden secrets, illegitimate children and elusive treasure in the process.

programme.title: Midsomer Murders
programme.desc: Martin Barrett, a local council clerk living in Midsomer Worthy, is murdered during the night by shotgun, prompting Barnaby and Jones to find a motive for his murder. When they discover that Barrett was an expert blackmailer, his victims become prime suspects for his death - from a local pub landlord, a cleaner, a prominent member of the police board, to a former marine geologist. As they investigate, finding themselves drawn to the seaside, they slowly uncover deception, theft, attempted blackmail and hatred.

programme.title: Midsomer Murders
programme.desc: In the village of Broughton, a ninety-year-old battle of the sexes has often occurred, with men trying to oppose an event that the women have managed to successfully hold without interruption, until it culminates with casualties on both sides - Mildred Danvers, an elderly woman who had returned on the day of a funeral and poisoned in her hotel room, and Rev. Anthony Gant, shot during a major event being held in the village green, in view of many. It soon becomes clear someone may have wished to kill both to cover up a dark truth, and soon Barnaby has to figure out who amongst the village wanted both dead, complicated further when Gant's curate is murdered next.

programme.title: Midsomer Murders
programme.desc: Villagers in Elverton-cum-Latterly are up in arms and divided, over the building of a supermarket. Things soon come to a head when independent environmental supervisor, Frank Hopkirk, is found stabbed to death at a Jubb's Timber Yard, the site of the new supermarket, by a pair of children. When Barnaby and Jones investigate to determine who wanted Hopkirk dead, they find out that he secretly came to the village under various aliases for sexual rendezvous with various women in fantasy role-playing scenarios, and that he had been making further investigations on the future development site and having doubts over claims it was contaminated. Either someone didn't like his investigations, or someone didn't like his sexual appetite, but either way, Barnaby finds himself investigating lies and more to uncover the truth.

programme.title: Midsomer Murders
programme.desc: Barnaby and DC Ben Jones (Jason Hughes) find themselves attempting to unravel the deaths of a choir tenor, and later a bird watcher, before more murders occur. The case is complicated by a rivalry between the Midsomer Worthy and Aston Wherry choirs, due to compete in an upcoming competition, and suspicions that an art scam is to be conducted, and soon Barnaby and Jones become concerned about a local woman, who they fear may become a victim herself. Particularly when it becomes clear the bird watcher had been photographing suspicious activity of late.

programme.title: Midsomer Murders
programme.desc: A few months ago, Annie Woodrow was arrested, accused of murdering her friend, Frances Trevelyan, on the motive of wanting Frances' husband. Her time in court has come, but DCI Barnaby is certain she still is holding things back in regards to the murder, and decides to monitor the trial. Yet a chance remark by Frances' youngest daughter, and a meeting with an old friend and psychiatrist, makes him begin to doubt the evidence for her conviction. Soon he and DC Jones, awaiting news of his promotion to DS, find themselves reinvestigating the case, and it soon becomes clear that they may have missed details that could implicate another in the murder.

programme.title: Midsomer Murders
programme.desc: When DCI Barnaby and DS Troy arrive in the sleepy village of Badger's Drift to investigate the sudden death of elderly Miss Emily Simpson, her next door neighbour insists that she had been murdered, after she had seen her return from a walk in the woods, unnerved and shocked by something she had witnessed. When the post mortem confirms her death was no accident, the pair discover that nothing is what it seems to be within the little village as they try to find out what exactly she saw. Their investigation introduces Barnaby and Troy to many eccentric and quirky residents and soon turns up a web of sex, blackmail and lies, and the possibility that the murder could be connected to a shooting accident two years ago, which claimed another woman's life.

programme.title: Midsomer Murders
programme.desc: After debating on who their next guest speaker should be, the Midsomer Worthy Writers' Circle decide to invite famous writer, Max Jennings, to their next meeting, despite opposition to the choice by Gerald Hadleigh, the group's chairman. When Hadleigh is found dead the day after Jennings visit, brutally bludgeoned and stripped naked, Barnaby and Troy discover that the victim had many mysteries to him, prompting them to delve into his private life and his past. Matters soon become complicated when Jennings disappears and is later found dead, and a witness recalls seeing a mysterious woman in Hadleigh's house the night before his murder.

programme.title: Midsomer Murders
programme.desc: Whilst investigating the murder of Agnes Gray, a quiet animal-loving woman who was bludgeoned to death and found floating in a river near to the village of Ferne Basset, Barnaby gets more than he bargained for when he attends his wife's performance in the Causton Amateur Dramatics' production of Amadeus. When Agnes's cousin, Esslyn Carmichael, inadvertently cuts his own throat during the final act, it's quickly discovered that the tape on the prop blade he had used was removed without anyone knowing. The detective is left wondering who had wanted to turn Esslyn's final act into a true coup de theatre, as he and Troy try to determine what the motive was behind the two murders.

programme.title: Midsomer Murders
programme.desc: Local villagers in Morton Fendle are up in arms, demanding answers from Alan Hollingsworth, the owner of a local craft centre they had invested in, after news comes out that it has recently fallen into financial turmoil. As tensions begin rising in the village, Barnaby soon suspects that something has happened to Alan's wife, Simone, when his behaviour suddenly changes. His suspicions are soon confirmed when it transpires that Simone was kidnapped, after one of Alan's neighbours is murdered, shortly after witnessing something they shouldn't have.

programme.title: Midsomer Murders
programme.desc: Following the funeral of local hotelier Karl Wainwright, his hotel's manager and a well liked Punch and Judy performer, Gregory Chambers, disappears unusually in yet another picturesque Midsomer village. Most people dismiss his disappearance completely but when he doesn't turn up, a search is conducted and a severed hand, confirmed to be Gregory's, turns up in the woods. Further deaths and a mushroom poisoning occur surrounding the beneficiaries of Karl Wainwright's will. All is not as it seems.

programme.title: Jonathan Creek
programme.desc: A wealthy kidnap victim appears to pull off a mind-boggling act of teleportation.

programme.title: Silent Witness
programme.desc: Nikki investigates the murders of two unidentified women.

programme.title: Silent Witness
programme.desc: Leo pursues the man responsible for the hit-and-run.

programme.title: Silent Witness
programme.desc: A turf war claims lives on the streets of London, but someone is pulling the strings.

programme.title: Silent Witness
programme.desc: Nikki finds herself in conflict with a detective over the death of a drug addict.

programme.title: Silent Witness
programme.desc: The team pursue a serial killer with a desire to look at his victims' faces as they die.

programme.title: Silent Witness
programme.desc: How did Dawn Pivcevic drown in a paddling pool containing just three inches of water?

programme.title: Silent Witness
programme.desc: Something lies behind the deaths of several different patients of a care home.

programme.title: Silent Witness
programme.desc: Harry tries to fathom a teenage suicide and Leo investigates a murdered bank manager.

programme.title: Bergerac
programme.desc: A stuntman dies filming an advert. Did he fall, or was he pushed?

programme.title: Bergerac
programme.desc: A penniless man arrives in Jersey, claiming to be a faith healer.

programme.title: Bergerac
programme.desc: Crozier gets news that the wife of Britain's most wanted criminal is arriving on Jersey.

programme.title: Bergerac

programme.title: Ice Road Truckers
programme.desc: When a Haul Road legend dies, Ray leads the trucker's son to scatter his ashes on Atigun.

programme.desc: Dalton rookie Ray Veilleux drives into a trucker's worst nightmare when he's distracted for a split-second.

programme.title: Ice Road Truckers
programme.desc: After just two days in the Arctic, the critical demands of the oil exploration sites are testing the limits of the truckers and their machines.

programme.title: Ice Road Truckers
programme.desc: Warming temperatures are causing overflows all over the ice road, and with water rushing through cracks in the ice, hauling loads just got a lot more dangerous.

programme.desc: Hugh and Eric are neck-in-neck in their race to claim dominance over the ice road, but with only days before the end of the season.

programme.title: Ax Men
programme.desc: In Alaska, Papac initiates an extremely dangerous process called Shotgun Logging; in Wyoming, the Zitterkopf men take the Bear Ranch site by storm; at Rygaard, the team doubles the yarders to increase production.

programme.title: Ax Men
programme.desc: Shelby uses an airboat to search for century-old logs; Rygaard attempts to move a six-ton cypress; David's sons hold down the fort while he delivers a load of logs to the mill; the Dreadknots suffer a late-day accident.

programme.title: Ax Men
programme.desc: Shelby tries to repair his custom-made buggy; David Zitterkopf makes a dangerous swing between trees; the Dreadknots go logging in the night; Triack is at a disadvantage when a crew member is injured.

programme.title: Ax Men
programme.desc: Louisiana, Shelby and his assistant Bob go out looking for logs on his repaired swamp buggy; In Central Florida, the Chapman crew goes to fight against the legendary Gump log.

programme.title: Ax Men
programme.desc: Shelby goes to Lake Ponchartrain with Belinda and Bob to obtain a huge log he marked years ago; In Florida, it's round two for the Chapman and Gump log; things go from bad to worse for the bare bones Rygaard crew.

programme.title: Ax Men
programme.desc: The Rygaards go old school to keep the team on track; Shelby and Bob find a valuable sinker cypress; the Zitterkopf crew tries to take on a dangerous tangle of logs known as "the teepee of death."

programme.title: Ax Men
programme.desc: In the Louisiana Bayou, Shelby Stanga's jet boat is in serious need of repair; in Washington, Gabe takes a risk and hires a wild card veteran logger; in Alaska, the Papac team is battling the elements mother nature is throwing their way.

programme.title: Ax Men
programme.desc: Shelby Stanga attempts to upgrade his logging empire, so he tries out some new equipment; DJ Jeremiah just may provide the spark the Rygaard has been missing; Triack's production is slowing down because of steep terrain and narrow logging roads.

programme.title: Ax Men

programme.title: Pawn Stars
programme.desc: The Pawn Stars are presented with the opportunity to add one of the world's most recognizable trophies to their collection--a Grammy. Will the gang put up the cash to get the gold or will the deal hit a sour note and be taken off the charts?

programme.title: Pawn Stars
programme.desc: Rick has a chance to buy a little piece of militaria he's never had before--a Flame Thrower. Can he turn up the heat and coax a deal or will this deal go up in flames? Corey and Chumlee head to an auction to bid on a classic gypsy fortune-teller machine.

programme.title: Pawn Stars
programme.desc: The Pawn Stars have a chance to buy a key from the 16th or 17th century, but this key doesn't just open doors, it shoots bullets!

programme.title: Pawn Stars
programme.desc: The Pawn Stars have a chance to buy one of the quietest air crafts ever made--a vintage Schweizer glider. Will the gang soar into a good deal and restore this glider to its high flying status or will they take it too close to the sun and get burned?

programme.title: Pawn Stars
programme.desc: The Pawn Stars have a chance to buy an extremely rare 18th century double-barrel coaching gun engraved with a mysterious golden script.

programme.title: Pawn Stars
programme.desc: When Corey has a chance to buy an extremely rare Belgium-made 1942 Sarolea motorcycle, Rick has a big concern...making money.

programme.title: Pawn Stars
programme.desc: The Pawn Stars have a chance to shoot and score with a 2006 NBA Championship Ring. Will the gang make the big score or will a surprise Shaq Attack throw the shop off its game?

programme.title: Pawn Stars
programme.desc: The Pawn Stars have an opportunity to buy something they've never bought before--a helicopter! Can Rick convince the Old Man to come along and spin up a deal? Then Rick has a chance to buy a 240-year-old lottery ticket.

programme.title: Pawn Stars
programme.desc: The Pawn Stars are presented with the opportunity to add one of the world's most recognizable trophies to their collection--a Grammy. Will the gang put up the cash to get the gold or will the deal hit a sour note and be taken off the charts?

programme.title: Pawn Stars
programme.desc: Rick has a chance to buy a little piece of militaria he's never had before--a Flame Thrower. Can he turn up the heat and coax a deal or will this deal go up in flames? Corey and Chumlee head to an auction to bid on a classic gypsy fortune-teller machine.

programme.title: Pawn Stars
programme.desc: The Pawn Stars have a chance to buy a key from the 16th or 17th century, but this key doesn't just open doors, it shoots bullets!

programme.title: Pawn Stars
programme.desc: The Pawn Stars have a chance to buy one of the quietest air crafts ever made--a vintage Schweizer glider. Will the gang soar into a good deal and restore this glider to its high flying status or will they take it too close to the sun and get burned?

programme.title: Pawn Stars
programme.desc: The Pawn Stars have a chance to buy an extremely rare 18th century double-barrel coaching gun engraved with a mysterious golden script.

programme.title: Pawn Stars
programme.desc: When Corey has a chance to buy an extremely rare Belgium-made 1942 Sarolea motorcycle, Rick has a big concern...making money.

programme.title: Pawn Stars
programme.desc: The Pawn Stars have a chance to shoot and score with a 2006 NBA Championship Ring. Will the gang make the big score or will a surprise Shaq Attack throw the shop off its game?

programme.title: Pawn Stars
programme.desc: The Pawn Stars have an opportunity to buy something they've never bought before--a helicopter! Can Rick convince the Old Man to come along and spin up a deal? Then Rick has a chance to buy a 240-year-old lottery ticket.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty
programme.desc: It's duck blind maintenance time again and the boys have discovered the waterline is low. At the levee, they realize this is the work of Phil's bucktoothed arch nemesis...THE BEAVER.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty
programme.desc: It's the 40-year anniversary of Duck Commander and this celebration is a redneck Robertson style shindig. To top off the event, Willie decides to construct the world's largest duck call to be revealed at the party.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty
programme.desc: To prove once and for all who rules the river AND the boardroom, Willie and Jase revive their childhood rivalry and go head-to-head in a fishing competition with the added challenge of having to sell their catch.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty
programme.desc: While out duck hunting, Willie, Jase, and Uncle Si stumble across what redneck's consider nature's most prized succulent treasure--a beehive dripping with wild honey.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty
programme.desc: When Willie finds out that his daughter Sadie has a new boyfriend, he wants to get to know him, while instilling some fatherly fear--Robertson style.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty
programme.desc: Willie decides to expand the Duck Commander brand into the winemaking industry and buys a vineyard...sight unseen.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty
programme.desc: Jase volunteers to take the Duck Commander RV out on pick up, but neglects to mention to Willie, he's taking Si, Martin and Jep along for a road trip.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty
programme.desc: A compilation of the best scenes from all 11 seasons of A&E's hit series Duck Dynasty.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty
programme.desc: Phil, Willie and Ms. Kay attempt to produce a cooking video for their fans.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty
programme.desc: Phil decides to teach his grandkids the value of a hard day's work by building a football field and culminating in a family football game. But Robertson vs. Robertson competition is further sparked.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty
programme.desc: After a big order comes in Willie pushes the Duck Commander team to meet the tight deadline, so Jase and the warehouse guys come up with a plan to build a conveyer belt.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty
programme.desc: Brotherly competition gets the best of Willie when he ditches his kids' career day to go play golf with Jase. Stepping in for Willie, Phil and Si show up at the school and become the teachers' worst nightmare.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty
programme.desc: After blowing up one of Phil's dangerously antiquated duck blinds, the Robertson boys hatch a wild plan to build a luxury duck blind in the sky. Meanwhile, Ms. Kay and the Robertson women hold a yard sale.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty
programme.desc: Jase feels being COO of Duck Commander entitles him to a new office. But when Willie refuses, Jase hatches a plan to build one anyhow. Willie takes Miss Kay and the grandkids to the petting zoo.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty
programme.desc: It's duck blind maintenance time again and the boys have discovered the waterline is low. At the levee, they realize this is the work of Phil's bucktoothed arch nemesis...THE BEAVER.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty
programme.desc: It's the 40-year anniversary of Duck Commander and this celebration is a redneck Robertson style shindig. To top off the event, Willie decides to construct the world's largest duck call to be revealed at the party.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty
programme.desc: To prove once and for all who rules the river AND the boardroom, Willie and Jase revive their childhood rivalry and go head-to-head in a fishing competition with the added challenge of having to sell their catch.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty
programme.desc: While out duck hunting, Willie, Jase, and Uncle Si stumble across what redneck's consider nature's most prized succulent treasure--a beehive dripping with wild honey.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty
programme.desc: When Willie finds out that his daughter Sadie has a new boyfriend, he wants to get to know him, while instilling some fatherly fear--Robertson style.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty
programme.desc: Willie decides to expand the Duck Commander brand into the winemaking industry and buys a vineyard...sight unseen.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty
programme.desc: Jase volunteers to take the Duck Commander RV out on pick up, but neglects to mention to Willie, he's taking Si, Martin and Jep along for a road trip.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty
programme.desc: A compilation of the best scenes from all 11 seasons of A&E's hit series Duck Dynasty.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty
programme.desc: Jase and Si embark on a turkey hunt for the annual Robertson men vs. Robertson women cook-off to create a feast of fresh wild game. With Phil's discerning palate as judge, the teams pull out all of the stops.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty
programme.desc: When a big business decision must be made affecting Duck Commander, Willie plans an employee retreat.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty
programme.desc: After attending a local radio show as a guest, Willie sees an opportunity to host a show of his own. When the station gives him the opportunity, Willie makes the mistake of bringing Uncle Si on the air with him.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty
programme.desc: The Jase, Si and the guys from the duck call room take a field trip to a brand new local donut shop and quickly find out who amongst them can eat the most delicious treats.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty
programme.desc: Willie receives a special gift from a Japanese business associate - a "priceless" samurai sword, which Willie keeps out of the hands of Jase and the guys.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty
programme.desc: Willie pushes his work force too far after implementing new "motivational work tactics," and the guys rise up against him and go on strike.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty
programme.desc: When NASCAR sensation Clint Bowyer pays a visit to the Duck Commander warehouse, Willie and the guys are fired up to spend the day hanging out with the professional racecar driver. But too much enthusiasm about the celebrity's mode of transportation turns into a drag race showdown between Willie and Clint. Phil and Si have their hands full fixing Ms. Kay's barbecue when a trip to the outdoor grill store turns disastrous.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty
programme.desc: It's Willie's turn to play Santa Claus at the local church this year but Uncle Si crashes the party and the event goes south in a hurry. Meanwhile, the family gathers at Phil and Miss Kay's house to celebrate the holidays in true redneck fashion.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty
programme.desc: Tomorrow is the opening day of Duck Season and the men are carrying on their tradition of camping on the Robertson Land the night before... including Willie.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty
programme.desc: Gearing up for his high school reunion, Willie realizes that he could stand to lose a few pounds. Jase and Korie set out to help him drop some weight and the strenuous battle of man-versus-waistline begins.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty
programme.desc: The guys learn from Willie that John Luke is going through his first break up. In order to make him feel better the men decide to take John Luke hunting for nutria, and impart their relationship wisdom.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty
programme.desc: When the warehouse guys new office pet (a lizard) escapes, they try all they can in order to catch the wily reptile. Proving impossible, the guys finally decide to bring in the big guns to help trap it--Mr. Phil Robertson.
